word: AND NOTWITHSTANDING THE DIVINE INSTRUCTION REGARDING THE PLAN OF THE BOOK, WHICH HAS MADE IT SO USEFUL TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC, MOTHER FELT THAT IT WAS ADDRESSED CHIEFLY TO THE ADVENTIST PEOPLE OF THE UNITED STATES. LATER, IN PREPARING IT FOR A WIDER CIRCULATION, SHE OMITTED A FEW PORTIONS THAT HAD APPEARED IN THE EARLIER EDITION. EXAMPLES OF THESE MAY BE FOUND IN THE CHAPTER ENTITLED, "THE SNARES OF SATAN," PAGES 518-530. . . .
